column5: when i was younger i use to like watching this movie .I cn't remeber the name and not sure if I will ever find it but here goes what I remember. It's about a boy that leaves home (I think) and he goes and lives in the woods. hefinds a big hollowed out tree to live in . he finds a raccoon and keeps as a pet/friend. he lives off the land and does meet a few people while out there. I think he gets snowed in in a storm too. He eventually returns to his real home.  any help to find it would be nice I would like my kids to watch it
I believe that is a movie based on the book "My Side of the Mountain" by Jean George... my favourite book as a kid.
thats it i knew if i heard the name it would come back. now I need to find it
lemme know if you do online or something.  i've never actually seen the movie, just read the book.  i've never been able to find the film.

As another member said it's called "My Side of the Mountain" I love this movie!!  I did have a copy that I downloaded of a torrent site but it wasn't that good. It was good to watch with my kids. Kinda reminded me of myself when I was younger.....heading out to the woods, making a shelter, cooking hot dogs........etc.  Hope you find it.

in process of d/l now from link hope the quality is ok  this reminds me also of a weekly series I use to watch  had cabins and group of kids and lots of nature type adventures they did lots of travle by canoe and i think talked with  a park ranger all the time
